titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Anonymous notebook

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.scopecontent: Notebook containing typescripts of articles from Washtenaw County, Michigan, newspapers relating to Ypsilanti, Michigan, Opera House, including articles about the programs presented there, both amateur and professional entertainments; also articles about Daniel L. Quirk.
